name: Instagram MERN
desc: Full-Stack Instagram clone built using MERN stack and realtime chat with the help of socket.iO

name: Flipkart MERN

name: Hotel Management System
desc: A full-stack web application designed to manage hotel operations efficiently. It includes features like room booking, customer management, and real-time availability updates.
features: Room booking system with real-time availability.
Customer details management and history tracking.
Admin dashboard for managing hotel operations.
Responsive UI for seamless experience on desktop and mobile.
